Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationships of de novo designed cyclic antimicrobial peptides based on gramicidin S.
Literature.Author: Lee DL, Hodges RS

Literature.Title: Optimization of microbial specificity in cyclic peptides by modulation of hydrophobicity within a defined structural framework.
Literature.Author: Kondejewski LH, Lee DL, Jelokhani-Niaraki M, Farmer SW, Hancock RE, Hodges RS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa H187(MIC=150µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H188(MIC=18µg/ml),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=13µg/ml),Escherichia coli DC2(MIC=9µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium C587(MIC=38µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium C610(MIC=6.2µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=50µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=>200µg/ml),Corynebacterium xerosis(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SAP 0017(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus K147(MIC=>200µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=>200µg/ml)
